content: coffee beans potholder *this pattern is only for personal use *be careful of the small part safety eyes for child who under 3 years old *this pattern is published in may 2025 ©onemanband abbreviations & symbol st s stitch round s rounds/ row chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet size & materials size 6 2 15 7cm x 6 3 16cm crochet hook 3 5mm yarn needle weave in the end with it yarn used aran 4 medium weight cotton yarn 16cm 6 2cm finished product front back pattern notes the pattern is written in 2 sections the potholder is worked in row the border in rounds the potholder is worked entirely in single_crochet if the pattern says a 5 it means that you need to single_crochet 1 in each of the next 5 sts using color a at the end of each row chain 1 and turn the initial chain 1 does not count as a st all odd-numbered row are crocheted on the right side all even-numbered row are crocheted on the wrong side … repeat the instructions within brackets for the indicated number of times with the exception of the border the stitch count is always 34 sts the color chart of the potholder can be found in the pdf pattern potholder a chain 35 ← row 1 rs b 3 crochet from second chain from hook a 2 b 6 a 18 b 5 34 sts → row 2 ws b 4 a 19 b 6 a 2 b 3 ← row 3 rs b 4 a 2 b 4 a 20 b 4 → row 4 ws b 2 a 6 b 8 a 8 b 4 a 2 b 4 ← row 5 rs b 4 a 2 b 3 a 6 b 13 a 6 → row 6 ws a 5 b 16 a 4 b 3 a 2 b 4 ← row 7 rs b 4 a 1 b 3 a 3 b 19 a 4 → row 8 ws a 3 b 2 a 6 b 13 a 3 b 2 a 1 b 3 a 1 ← row 9 rs a 2 b 4 a 3 b 11 a 5 b 3 a 2 b 1 a 3 → row 10 ws a 3 b 8 a 4 b 11 a 8 ← row 11 rs a 8 b 10 a 2 b 11 a 3 → row 12 ws a 3 b 12 a 2 b 10 a 7 ← row 13 rs a 7 b 9 a 2 b 13 a 3 → row 14 ws a 3 b 14 a 2 b 8 a 5 b 2 ← row 15 rs b 3 a 4 b 7 a 2 b 14 a 4 → row 16 ws a 5 b 14 a 3 b 5 a 3 b 3 a 1 ← row 17 rs a 1 b 4 a 2 b 1 a 5 b 15
